metadata.purpose: This file stores all contradictions found during agent runtime. Per A9 (Contradiction) and A2 (Memory), contradictions are preserved rather than silently resolved, and this log is append-only with no destructive overwrites.

contradiction_entry.task_id: string - ID of the task where contradiction was found
contradiction_entry.timestamp_utc: string - ISO timestamp of when contradiction was logged
contradiction_entry.resolution_notes: string (optional) - Notes on how/if the contradiction was resolved
contradiction_entry.resolved_at: string (optional) - When the contradiction was resolved

usage_notes: This log is append-only. Do not delete or modify existing entries.
When a contradiction is found, add a new entry to the 'contradictions' array.
When a contradiction is resolved by a human, update the resolution field but preserve the original conflict.
This log exists per A9: 'If the agent finds conflicting requirements, it must log them instead of overwriting or silently resolving them.'
